## Bessel's correction

Population variance
$$\sigma^2 = \frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^{N} (x_i - \mu)$$

Sample variance
$$s^2 = \frac{1}{N-1} \sum_{i=1}^{N} (x_i - \bar{x})$$
